trigger: These results suggest a novel mechanism by which integrin - mediated cell adhesion can modulate the magnitude of cytokine - induced signal transduction pathways , thereby amplifying cellular events leading to monocyte activation and inflammation .

These results suggest a novel mechanism by which integrin - mediated cell adhesion can modulate the magnitude of cytokine - induced signal transduction pathways , thereby amplifying cellular events leading to monocyte activation and inflammation .
